external_games.name: Train Simulator: Wutachtalbahn: Lauchringen – Immendingen Route Add-On

name: Train Simulator 2021: Wutachtalbahn - Lauchringen: Immendingen Route
summary: Clinging to the Swiss border, the Wutach Valley Railway is perhaps the most unique and splendid in all of Germany. Packed with higher and lower speed running, stunning scenery and spectacular viaducts, the Wutachtalbahn, complete with fantastic steam action, is yours to experience in this stunning add-on for Train Simulator!
